EmailTemplate.subject: PA13-004 - VisiNet Solutions 5.2.0 Patch 16 Release Notes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Product Announcement PA13-004 – VisiNet Solutions 5.2.0 Patch 16 Release Notes POSTED: 03-14-13
Dear Clients,
The Product Announcement, PA13-004 - VisiNet Solutions 5.2.0 Patch 16 Release Notes <https://na6.salesforce.com/articles/Release_Notes/Command-5-2-0-Patch16-Release-Notes?popup=true> has been posted to the Support site.
You may access this release note by logging into the Salesforce site and search under Articles or by clicking on the link <https://na6.salesforce.com/articles/Release_Notes/Command-5-2-0-Patch16-Release-Notes?popup=true> included on this e-mail.
Sincerely,
Shane Birch Technical Support Supervisor – 911/Inform (VisiNet) | Decorah, IA TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com <tritech.com>
Support Website: Salesforce.com <salesforce.com>
